= API Reference guide =

The API reference is generated with DOxygen from the CDMA source code. It is split in 3 parts:

For client application developers:
[http://cdma.googlecode.com/svn/c++/core/trunk/doc/clientAPI/html/index.html Client reference API]

For data format engines developers:
[http://cdma.googlecode.com/svn/c++/core/trunk/doc/engineAPI/html/index.html Engine reference API]

For plug-ins developpers:
[http://cdma.googlecode.com/svn/c++/core/trunk/doc/pluginAPI/html/index.html Plug-ins reference API]
